item.title: Covad Lets T1 Lines Go Wireless
item.description: While T1 lines are currently the standard for dedicated internet and business phone service for small and medium businesses, their future might be wireless. Similar to how wireless technology changed phone service, it is now impacting broadband data delivery. Covad, a national provider of T1 and related services, is at the forefront of this change. While they offer traditional wired T1 service in most areas, they’ve deployed “T1-class wireless broadband” in some major cities using pre-WiMAX technology.
